name: Fuu Project
description:
The world has been devastated by a nuclear war. After a hundred years of peace in a humble mountain village, in your sixteenth birthday and as is the tradition in the village you have to face the "test", by overcoming the difficult test you obtain a mysterious power to help your people.

You'll face a comic adventure full of mutant people, freaks and all sorts of mutant creatures that will stand in your way, it's up to you how to solve the situation.

(This game is a work in progress)
Prologue complete.

Advice from the prologue

At the moment there are only two playable characters...in the future two more will be included. (magician and healer)

The approximate duration of the demo is 1 hour, it can be less or more.

There are a lot of interesting elements (feel free to search in the trash).

The mission of a magazine can be given to three different people. (in future i like a lot of mision like this)

Have fun and thanks to play the game !
